titleStmt.title: Mount Caluarie, the second part: compyled by the reuerend father Don Anthonio de Gueuara ... In this booke the author treateth of the seuen words which Christ our redeemer spake hanging vpon the Crosse. Translated out of Spanish into English
Monte Calvario. Part 2. English
titleStmt.author: Guevara, Antonio de, Bp., d. 1545?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Adam Islip for Edward White, and are to bee sold at his shop by the little north dore of Pouls, at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: A translation of part 2 of: Monte Calvario.
Running title reads: The second part of the mysteries of Mount Caluarie.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Appears at reel 319 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 1307 (Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library copy).

person.persName: the little north dore of Pouls
